name: Krystal
objective: As a secret prosecution witness, her objective is to provide critical insights through her blog entries, aiming to clarify the events on the day of the crime. She may have to defend the reliability of her blog and memory against skepticism, potentially leading her to question her own reliance on her daily entries.
scratch: As a passionate student of theater arts, I find immense joy in capturing the world around me through my blog. Despite my confidence in my recollections, I acknowledge they might not always be precise and I might inadvertently embellish my entries or amalgamate events from different days. My blog post (R0003) notes that on the incident day, I sketched in Central Park, bought coffee at 2 PM, and stayed there all afternoon.
background: She, a theater arts student brimming with enthusiasm for life, passionately records her daily experiences on her blog. In the case at hand, her blog, R0003, serves as crucial testimony, which may overturn C0002's alibi.
